title: Harvest restriction data sources
description: List of data sources used to generate harvest restrictions, in order of hierarchy

alias.description: Unique slug used to name/identify the data source when processing

class_number.description: Number of the generalized harvest restriction class associatated with the data source

class_name.description: Name of the generalized harvest restriction class associatated with the data source

source_type.description: True if the data source is file based, not required if data source to be extracted from BCGW

source.description: Full name of the BCGW table to use as source (eg, WHSE_ADMIN_BOUNDARIES.CLAB_NATIONAL_PARKS) or url/path of a file based source readable by GDAL/OGR

layer.description: Layer to use within a file based source

name_column.description: Text column in source/layer to use for restriction_name

query.description: Query to subset data in source/layer - ECQL for BCGW sources, OGR SQL for files
